page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SARAH
page.content: I get up at 7.30 am every morning and get washed and dressed. Each school day I wear school uniform. During the summer term a green checked dress or a other times grey skirt, white blouse, green cardigan and tie. I usually have a cooked breakfast before school. At 8.30 I go to St. Mary's Platt C.E. Primary School by car. I'm hymn book monitor so I get there earlier. The bell goes at 8.58 and we go inside for registration, then into the hall for assembly. I clear up the hymn books and go to the classroom for Religious Education and Drama. Break lasts 15 minutes and afterwards we have Maths and reading workshop. I have school dinners. Then we go swimming at Swanley Baths. We arrive back and have spelling tests. I stay at school for Dance Club and Piano lesson.
